item.title: Config
item.description: The configuration file To have configuration settings loaded at startup, create a file called autoexec.cfg and place it in your arena or baseq3 folder. When changing CVAR (dynamic variables) there are a couple of different set commands that can be used. set sets a cvar seta sets a cvar and flags it as archive sets sets a cvar and flags it as server info sett sets a cvar and flags it as tool setu sets a cvar and flags it as user info Get inspired Back in the day ones Quake 3 configuration file was a closely guarded secret, today; we share .

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Pick your engine! The original game engine can present issues on modern operating systems, luckily for us id Software open sourced the engine on August 19, 2005 as they have with many of their prior engines. Since then the community have and are still updating the engine and make sure that it works for our modern computers. Keep in mind that you will still need pak0.pk3 from the original game.

item.title: Common issues
item.description: Version missmatch Make sure you have arena loaded before attempting to join the server, alternatively start quake with the command line option +set fs_game arena. Set cl_allowDownload to 1 in order to download whatever assets might be missing in your local installation from the server. Experiencing lag Try the following in your configuration: set cl_maxpackets 125 set cl_timeNudge -12 set rate 25000 set snaps 40 Wrong resolution Try the following in your configuration.
